data.description: Component Interface is not on a Permission List
data.sql:
SELECT 
  B.BCNAME 
 
FROM 
  PSPROJECTITEM A, 
  PSBCDEFN B 
WHERE 
  A.OBJECTVALUE1 = B.BCNAME
   AND A.PROJECTNAME = : 1 
  and objecttype = 32
 and bcname NOT IN
(SELECT bcname FROM PSAUTHBUSCOMP)

data.description: Component Add Link missing message catalog in project
data.sql:
SELECT 
  A.ADDLINKMSGSET, 
  A.ADDLINKMSGNUM 
FROM 
  PSPNLGRPDEFN A, 
  PSPROJECTITEM B 
WHERE 
  B.OBJECTTYPE = 7 
  AND B.OBJECTID1 = 10 
  AND B.OBJECTVALUE1 = A.PNLGRPNAME 
  AND A.ADDLINKMSGSET > 20000 
  AND B.PROJECTNAME = : 1 
  AND NOT EXISTS(
    SELECT 
      'X' 
    FROM 
      PSPROJECTITEM C 
    WHERE 
      C.OBJECTTYPE = 25 
      AND C.OBJECTID1 = 48 
      AND C.OBJECTVALUE1 = A.ADDLINKMSGSET 
      AND C.OBJECTID2 = 49 
      AND C.OBJECTVALUE2 = A.ADDLINKMSGNUM 
      AND C.PROJECTNAME = B.PROJECTNAME
  )

data.description: Component Interfaces in PeopleCode that do not exist in the database.
data.sql:
SELECT 
  B.REFNAME, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE1, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE2, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE3, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE4 
FROM 
  PSPROJECTITEM A, 
  PSPCMNAME B 
WHERE 
  A.OBJECTVALUE1 = B.OBJECTVALUE1 
  AND A.OBJECTVALUE2 = B.OBJECTVALUE2 
  AND (
    A.OBJECTVALUE3 = B.OBJECTVALUE3 
    OR A.OBJECTVALUE3 = ' '
  ) 
  AND (
    A.OBJECTVALUE4 = B.OBJECTVALUE4 
    OR A.OBJECTVALUE4 = ' '
  ) 
  AND A.OBJECTID1 = B.OBJECTID1 
  AND A.OBJECTID2 = B.OBJECTID2 
  AND (
    A.OBJECTID3 = B.OBJECTID3 
    OR A.OBJECTID3 = 0
  ) 
  AND (
    A.OBJECTID4 = B.OBJECTID4 
    OR A.OBJECTID4 = 0
  ) 
  AND B.RECNAME = 'COMPINTFC' 
  AND A.PROJECTNAME = : 1 
  AND NOT EXISTS(
    SELECT 
      'X' 
    FROM 
      PSBCDEFN C 
    WHERE 
      B.REFNAME = C.BCNAME
  )

data.description: Component missing description
data.sql:
SELECT B.PNLGRPNAME, B.DESCR
FROM PSPROJECTITEM A 
JOIN PSPNLGRPDEFN B 
ON A.OBJECTVALUE1 = B.PNLGRPNAME
where
A.OBJECTTYPE = 7 
AND A.PROJECTNAME = :1
AND (B.DESCR IS NULL  or B.DESCR = ' ' )

data.description: Components without portal registration in the database
data.sql:
SELECT 
  B.PNLGRPNAME, 
  B.DESCR 
FROM 
  PSPROJECTITEM A, 
  PSPNLGRPDEFN B 
WHERE 
  B.PNLGRPNAME = A.OBJECTVALUE1 
  AND B.MARKET = A.OBJECTVALUE2 
  AND A.OBJECTTYPE = 7 
  AND A.PROJECTNAME = :1 
  AND NOT EXISTS(
    SELECT 
      'X' 
    FROM 
      PSPRSMDEFN C 
    WHERE 
      B.PNLGRPNAME = C.PORTAL_URI_SEG2
  )

data.description: Components without a portal registry item in the same project
data.sql:
SELECT 
  B.PNLGRPNAME, 
  B.DESCR 
FROM 
  PSPROJECTITEM A, 
  PSPNLGRPDEFN B 
WHERE 
  B.PNLGRPNAME = A.OBJECTVALUE1 
  AND B.MARKET = A.OBJECTVALUE2 
  AND A.OBJECTTYPE = 7 
  AND A.PROJECTNAME = : 1 
  AND NOT EXISTS(
    SELECT 
      'X' 
    FROM 
      PSPROJECTITEM C, 
      PSPRSMDEFN D 
    WHERE 
      C.OBJECTTYPE = 55 
      AND C.OBJECTID1 = 99 
      AND C.OBJECTVALUE1 = D.PORTAL_NAME 
      AND C.OBJECTID2 = 100 
      AND C.OBJECTVALUE2 = D.PORTAL_REFTYPE 
      AND C.OBJECTID3 = 101 
      AND C.OBJECTVALUE3 = D.PORTAL_OBJNAME 
      AND A.PROJECTNAME = C.PROJECTNAME 
      AND B.PNLGRPNAME = D.PORTAL_URI_SEG2
  )

data.description: Fields by fieldname in PeopleCode do not exist in the database
data.sql:
SELECT 
  B.RECNAME, 
  B.REFNAME, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE1, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE2, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE3, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE4 
FROM 
  PSPROJECTITEM A, 
  PSPCMNAME B 
WHERE 
  A.OBJECTVALUE1 = B.OBJECTVALUE1 
  AND A.OBJECTVALUE2 = B.OBJECTVALUE2 
  AND (
    A.OBJECTVALUE3 = B.OBJECTVALUE3 
    OR A.OBJECTVALUE3 = ' '
  ) 
  AND (
    A.OBJECTVALUE4 = B.OBJECTVALUE4 
    OR A.OBJECTVALUE4 = ' '
  ) 
  AND A.OBJECTID1 = B.OBJECTID1 
  AND A.OBJECTID2 = B.OBJECTID2 
  AND (
    A.OBJECTID3 = B.OBJECTID3 
    OR A.OBJECTID3 = 0
  ) 
  AND (
    A.OBJECTID4 = B.OBJECTID4 
    OR A.OBJECTID4 = 0
  ) 
  AND B.RECNAME NOT IN (
    'FIELD', 'PACKAGE', 'RECORD', 'SCROLL', 
    'PAGE', 'COMPONENT', 'PANELGROUP', 
    'PANEL', 'SQL', 'MENUNAME', 'ITEMNAME', 
    'BARNAME', 'HTML', 'IMAGE', 'OPERATION', 
    'FILELAYOUT', 'COMPINTFC', 'STYLESHEET', 
    'MESSAGE', 'BUSEVENT', 'URL', 'BUSACTIVITY', 
    'BUSPROCESS', 'INTERLINK', 'PORTAL', 
    'NODE'
  ) 
  AND B.REFNAME <> ' ' 
  AND A.PROJECTNAME = : 1 
  AND NOT EXISTS(
    SELECT 
      'X' 
    FROM 
      PSDBFIELD C 
    WHERE 
      B.REFNAME = C.FIELDNAME
  )

data.description: Fields in the project missing translate values in the same project
data.sql:
SELECT 
  A.FIELDNAME, 
  A.FIELDVALUE, 
  A.EFFDT 
FROM 
  PSXLATITEM A, 
  PSPROJECTITEM B 
WHERE 
  B.OBJECTTYPE = 2 
  AND B.OBJECTVALUE1 = A.FIELDNAME 
  AND B.OBJECTID2 = 0 
  AND A.LASTUPDOPRID <> 'PPLSOFT' 
  AND B.PROJECTNAME = :1
  AND NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 
      'X' 
    FROM 
      PSPROJECTITEM C 
    WHERE C.OBJECTTYPE = 4 
      AND C.OBJECTID1 = 6 
      AND C.OBJECTVALUE1 = A.FIELDNAME 
      AND C.OBJECTID2 = 22 
      AND C.OBJECTVALUE2 = A.FIELDVALUE 
      AND C.OBJECTID3 = 21 
      AND %DATEIN(C.OBJECTVALUE3) = A.EFFDT
      AND C.PROJECTNAME = B.PROJECTNAME 
  )

data.description: Fields with missing xlat values based on lastupddtm in the project
data.sql:
SELECT 
  A.FIELDNAME, 
  A.FIELDVALUE, 
  A.EFFDT 
FROM 
  PSXLATITEM A, 
  PSPROJECTITEM B 
WHERE 
  B.OBJECTTYPE = 2 
  AND B.OBJECTVALUE1 = A.FIELDNAME 
 AND B.OBJECTID2 = 0 
  AND B.PROJECTNAME = :1
 AND A.LASTUPDDTTM >= %CurrentDateTimeIn - (:2)
  AND NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 
      'X' 
    FROM 
      PSPROJECTITEM C 
    WHERE C.OBJECTTYPE = 4 
      AND C.OBJECTID1 = 6 
      AND C.OBJECTVALUE1 = A.FIELDNAME 
      AND C.OBJECTID2 = 22 
      AND C.OBJECTVALUE2 = A.FIELDVALUE 
      AND C.OBJECTID3 = 21 
      AND TO_DATE(C.OBJECTVALUE3,'YYYY-MM-DD') = A.EFFDT
      AND C.PROJECTNAME = B.PROJECTNAME 
  )

data.description: Fields with a static label on pages in the project
data.sql:
SELECT 
  A.PNLNAME, 
  A.PNLFLDID, 
  A.PNLFIELDNAME, 
  A.RECNAME, 
  A.FIELDNAME 
FROM 
  PSPNLFIELD A, 
  PSPNLFIELDEXT B, 
  PSPROJECTITEM C 
WHERE 
  A.PNLNAME = B.PNLNAME 
  AND A.PNLFLDID = B.PNLFLDID 
  AND LBLTYPE = 1 
  AND B.GRPBOXTYPE <> 5 
  AND A.LBLTEXT <> ' ' 
  AND A.PNLNAME = C.OBJECTVALUE1 
  AND C.OBJECTTYPE = 5 
  AND C.PROJECTNAME = : 1

data.description: Fields with a static placeholder text in the project (Fluid)
data.sql:
SELECT 
  A.PNLNAME, 
  A.PNLFLDID, 
  A.FIELDNUM, 
  A.PNLFIELDNAME, 
  A.LABEL_ID, 
  A.LBLTEXT, 
  A.RECNAME, 
  A.FIELDNAME, 
  B.PLHTYPE, 
  B.PLACEHOLDER 
FROM 
  PSPNLFIELD A, 
  PSPNLFIELDEXT B, 
  PSPROJECTITEM C 
WHERE 
  A.PNLNAME = B.PNLNAME 
  AND A.PNLFLDID = B.PNLFLDID 
  AND A.PNLNAME = C.OBJECTVALUE1 
  AND C.OBJECTTYPE = 5 
  AND PLHTYPE = 1 
  AND C.PROJECTNAME = : 1

data.description: Field label IDs that do not match the field name
data.sql:
SELECT 
  A.FIELDNAME, 
  A.LABEL_ID 
FROM 
  PSDBFLDLABL A, 
  PSDBFIELD B, 
  PSPROJECTITEM C 
WHERE 
  B.FIELDNAME = A.FIELDNAME 
  AND C.OBJECTTYPE = 2 
  AND C.OBJECTID2 = 0 
  AND C.OBJECTVALUE1 = A.FIELDNAME 
  AND C.PROJECTNAME = : 1 
  AND B.LASTUPDOPRID <> 'PPLSOFT' 
  AND A.LABEL_ID <> A.FIELDNAME

  ) 
  AND (
    A.OBJECTVALUE4 = B.OBJECTVALUE4 
    OR A.OBJECTVALUE4 = ' '
  ) 
  AND A.OBJECTID1 = B.OBJECTID1 
  AND A.OBJECTID2 = B.OBJECTID2 
  AND (
    A.OBJECTID3 = B.OBJECTID3 
    OR A.OBJECTID3 = 0
  ) 
  AND (
    A.OBJECTID4 = B.OBJECTID4 
    OR A.OBJECTID4 = 0
  ) 
  AND B.RECNAME = 'IMAGE' 
  AND A.PROJECTNAME = : 1 
  AND NOT EXISTS(
    SELECT 
      'X' 
    FROM 
      PSCONTDEFN C 
    WHERE 
      B.REFNAME = C.CONTNAME 
      AND C.CONTTYPE = 1
  )

data.description: Missing Comments in Properties
data.sql:
SELECT 'Records' "OBJECTID", 
       p.objectvalue1, p.objectvalue2, p.objectvalue3, p.objectvalue4
FROM sysadm.PSPROJECTITEM p,
                sysadm.psrecdefn x
WHERE p.projectname = :1
AND x.recname = p.objectvalue1
AND p.objecttype= 0
AND (x.descrlong IS NULL OR objectownerid = ' ' OR recdescr = ' ')
UNION
SELECT 'Fields', 
       p.objectvalue1, p.objectvalue2, p.objectvalue3, p.objectvalue4
FROM sysadm.PSPROJECTITEM p,
                sysadm.psdbfield x
WHERE p.projectname = :1
AND x.fieldname = p.objectvalue1
AND p.objecttype= 2
AND (x.descrlong IS NULL OR objectownerid = ' ')
UNION
SELECT 'Pages',  
       p.objectvalue1, p.objectvalue2, p.objectvalue3, p.objectvalue4
FROM sysadm.PSPROJECTITEM p,
                sysadm.pspnldefn x
WHERE p.projectname = :1
AND x.pnlname = p.objectvalue1
AND p.objecttype= 5
AND (x.descrlong IS NULL OR objectownerid = ' ' OR descr = ' ')
UNION
SELECT 'Menus',  
       p.objectvalue1, p.objectvalue2, p.objectvalue3, p.objectvalue4
FROM sysadm.PSPROJECTITEM p,
                sysadm.psmenudefn x
WHERE p.projectname = :1
AND x.menuname = p.objectvalue1
AND p.objecttype= 6
AND (x.descrlong IS NULL OR objectownerid = ' ' OR descr = ' ')
UNION
SELECT 'Components',  
       p.objectvalue1, p.objectvalue2, p.objectvalue3, p.objectvalue4
FROM sysadm.PSPROJECTITEM p,
                sysadm.pspnlgrpdefn x
WHERE p.projectname = :1
AND x.pnlgrpname = p.objectvalue1
AND x.market = p.objectvalue2
AND p.objecttype= 7
AND (x.descrlong IS NULL OR objectownerid = ' ' OR descr = ' ')
UNION
SELECT 'Message Catalog Entries',  
       p.objectvalue1, p.objectvalue2, p.objectvalue3, p.objectvalue4
FROM sysadm.PSPROJECTITEM p,
                sysadm.PSMSGCATDEFN x
WHERE p.projectname = :1
AND x.message_set_nbr = p.objectvalue1
AND x.message_nbr = p.objectvalue2
AND p.objecttype= 25
AND x.descrlong IS NULL
UNION
SELECT 'Application Engine Programs',  
       p.objectvalue1, p.objectvalue2, p.objectvalue3, p.objectvalue4
FROM sysadm.PSPROJECTITEM p,
                sysadm.PSAEAPPLDEFN x
WHERE p.projectname = :1
AND x.ae_applid = p.objectvalue1
AND p.objecttype= 33
AND (x.descrlong IS NULL OR objectownerid = ' ' OR descr = ' ')
UNION
SELECT 'Application Engine Sections',  
       p.objectvalue1, p.objectvalue2, x.ae_step, ' '
FROM sysadm.PSPROJECTITEM p,
                sysadm.PSAEAPPLDEFN s,
                sysadm.psaestepdefn x
WHERE p.projectname = :1
AND x.ae_applid = p.objectvalue1
AND x.ae_section = p.objectvalue2
AND s.ae_applid = x.ae_applid
AND p.objecttype= 34
AND x.descrlong IS NULL
UNION
SELECT 'Query',  
       p.objectvalue1, ' ',' ', ' '
FROM sysadm.PSPROJECTITEM p,
                sysadm.psqrydefn x
              
WHERE p.projectname = :1
AND x.qryname = p.objectvalue1

AND p.objecttype= 10
AND x.descrlong IS NULL
;

data.description: Records that are obsolete in the project
data.sql:
SELECT B.RECNAME
FROM PSPROJECTITEM A,
     PSRECDEFN B
WHERE A.OBJECTTYPE = 0
  AND A.OBJECTID1 = 1
  AND A.OBJECTVALUE1 = B.RECNAME
  AND A.OBJECTID2 = 0
  AND A.PROJECTNAME = : 1
  AND NOT EXISTS
    (SELECT 'X'
     FROM PSPNLFIELD C, PSPROJECTITEM D
     WHERE D.OBJECTTYPE = 5
       AND D.OBJECTID1 = 9
       AND C.PNLNAME = D.OBJECTVALUE1
       AND B.RECNAME = C.RECNAME
       AND A.PROJECTNAME = D.PROJECTNAME )
  AND NOT EXISTS
    (SELECT 'X'
     FROM PSRECFIELD C, PSPROJECTITEM D
     WHERE D.OBJECTTYPE = 0
       AND D.OBJECTID1 = 1
       AND C.RECNAME = D.OBJECTVALUE1
       AND B.RECNAME = C.EDITTABLE
       AND A.PROJECTNAME = D.PROJECTNAME )
  AND NOT EXISTS
    (SELECT 'X'
     FROM PSRECDEFN C, PSPROJECTITEM D
     WHERE D.OBJECTTYPE = 0
       AND D.OBJECTID1 = 1
       AND C.RECNAME = D.OBJECTVALUE1
       AND B.RECNAME = C.RELLANGRECNAME
       AND A.PROJECTNAME = D.PROJECTNAME )
  AND NOT EXISTS
    (SELECT 'X'
     FROM PSPNLGRPDEFN C, PSPROJECTITEM D
     WHERE D.OBJECTTYPE = 7
       AND D.OBJECTID1 = 10
       AND C.PNLGRPNAME = D.OBJECTVALUE1
       AND (B.RECNAME = C.SEARCHRECNAME
            OR B.RECNAME = C.ADDSRCHRECNAME)
       AND A.PROJECTNAME = D.PROJECTNAME )
data.notes: Records in the project that do not exist on a page in the project, do not exist as a prompt record for another record in the project, do not exist as a related language record for a another record in the project and do not exist as a search record for a component in the project.

data.description: Record Views without records in the project
data.sql:
SELECT A.OBJECTVALUE1
FROM PSPROJECTITEM A
WHERE A.PROJECTNAME = :1
	AND A.OBJECTTYPE = 30
	AND A.OBJECTID1 = 65

	AND A.OBJECTVALUE2 = 2

data.description: Records with a default record that is missing from the database
data.sql:
SELECT 
  B.RECNAME, 
  B.DEFRECNAME 
FROM

data.description: Record names referenced in PeopleCode that do not exist in the database
data.sql:
SELECT 
  B.REFNAME, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE1, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE2, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE3, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE4 
FROM 
  PSPROJECTITEM A, 
  PSPCMNAME B 
WHERE 
  A.OBJECTVALUE1 = B.OBJECTVALUE1 
  AND A.OBJECTVALUE2 = B.OBJECTVALUE2 
  AND (
    A.OBJECTVALUE3 = B.OBJECTVALUE3 
    OR A.OBJECTVALUE3 = ' '
  ) 
  AND (
    A.OBJECTVALUE4 = B.OBJECTVALUE4 
    OR A.OBJECTVALUE4 = ' '
  ) 
  AND A.OBJECTID1 = B.OBJECTID1 
  AND A.OBJECTID2 = B.OBJECTID2 
  AND (
    A.OBJECTID3 = B.OBJECTID3 
    OR A.OBJECTID3 = 0
  ) 
  AND (
    A.OBJECTID4 = B.OBJECTID4 
    OR A.OBJECTID4 = 0
  ) 
  AND B.RECNAME NOT IN (
    'FIELD', 'PACKAGE', 'RECORD', 'SCROLL', 
    'PAGE', 'COMPONENT', 'PANELGROUP', 
    'PANEL', 'SQL', 'MENUNAME', 'ITEMNAME', 
    'BARNAME', 'HTML', 'IMAGE', 'OPERATION', 
    'FILELAYOUT', 'COMPINTFC', 'STYLESHEET', 
    'MESSAGE', 'BUSEVENT', 'URL', 'BUSACTIVITY', 
    'BUSPROCESS', 'INTERLINK', 'PORTAL', 
    'NODE'
  ) 
  AND B.RECNAME <> ' ' 
  AND A.PROJECTNAME = : 1 
  AND NOT EXISTS(
    SELECT 
      'X' 
    FROM 
      PSRECDEFN C 
    WHERE 
      B.RECNAME = C.RECNAME
  )

data.description: Subpages (sub / secundary) not in pages in the database but in the project
data.sql:
SELECT A.OBJECTVALUE1,
       B.DESCR
FROM PSPROJECTITEM A
JOIN PSPNLDEFN B ON A.OBJECTVALUE1 = B.PNLNAME
WHERE A.OBJECTTYPE = 5
  AND B.PNLTYPE IN (1,
                    2)
  AND A.PROJECTNAME = :1
  AND NOT EXISTS
    (SELECT 'X'
     FROM PSPNLFIELD C
     WHERE B.PNLNAME = C.SUBPNLNAME)

data.description: Subpages without the page they are linked to in the project
data.sql:
SELECT A.OBJECTVALUE1,
       B.DESCR
FROM PSPROJECTITEM A
JOIN PSPNLDEFN B ON A.OBJECTVALUE1 = B.PNLNAME
WHERE A.OBJECTTYPE = 5
  AND B.PNLTYPE IN (1,
                    2)
  AND A.PROJECTNAME = :1
  AND NOT EXISTS
    (SELECT 'X'
     FROM PSPNLFIELD C, PSPROJECTITEM D
     WHERE B.PNLNAME = C.SUBPNLNAME
       AND C.PNLNAME = D.OBJECTVALUE1
       AND D.OBJECTTYPE = 5
       AND D.OBJECTID1 = 9
       AND D.PROJECTNAME = :1)
data.notes: Do we have subpages in the project where the matching page is not in the project? Relevant in case you have subpages that you actually did not wanted or in case you forgot to add the page.
